mapper.insert: insert into AppAuthorization (ID, UserID, UserName, Time, Mac, Brand, State, Admin) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mac,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{admin,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update AppAuthorization set UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserName = #{userName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Mac = #{mac,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Brand = #{brand,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, State = #{state,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Admin = #{admin,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, UserID, UserName, Time, Mac, Brand, State, Admin from AppAuthorization
